articles.title: Sri Lanka Live Updates: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa Flees the Country
articles.description: Gotabaya Rajapaksa took a military plane overnight to the Maldives, which is a close ally. Hundreds of protesters flocked to the president’s residence hours later as it was unclear who was leading the nation.
articles.content:

articles.title: 7/11 shootings: Devastated father mourns son killed by SoCal 7-Eleven gunman

articles.author: Joey Garrison, USA TODAY
articles.title: Inside the 'unhinged' Oval Office meeting that divided Trump's orbit before the Jan. 6 attack
articles.description: During a long, intense meeting at the White House Dec. 18, 2020, members of Donald Trump's inner circle fought over baseless claims of election fraud.
articles.content:
• The meeting lasted six hours and spilled into different parts of the White House.
  • Attorney Sidney Powell and company were pitted against Pat Cipollone and other White House lawyers.
